name: Strike Fire - Break The Door
description:
You are a super soldier, the mission is to destroy all enemies in the enemy base. You must work hard to adapt to the harsh environment so that you are not defeated by the enemy.

Follow the tips to learn how to use various weapons and complete the level tasks in a limited amount of time.

Different weapon operation modes bring you different game experiences. Flexible use of tactics, in order to achieve goals, skilled skills, in order to overcome the enemy.
